title: Excavation Combination Bucket
descrption: 4 in 1 combination bucket with jaw actuation and electro-magnetic pick up capabilities

title: Drivetrain
descrption: 200W Brushless motors with a 40 to 1 planetary reduction

title: Wheels
descrption: Large 3D printed PETG wheels with tough annd flexible TPU tires

title: Suspension
descrption: 4-wheel rocker suspension which allows for extreme wheel travel

title: Compute
descrption: Jetson Orin Nano running ROS2 for sensor integation and rover control
